title: Qalat-i Dinka
description: Archaeological site in the Peshdar Plain with remains dated to the Neo-Assyrian period. The mound is part of a larger frontier settlement known as the Dinka Settlement Complex.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Qalat-i Dinka site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Radner et al. 2017.
properties.title: OSM location of Qalat-i Dinka
